lesson_info.title: Data Science Workflow
lesson_info.description: Step-by-step process of data science projects

learning_objectives: Understand the fundamental concepts and principles of Data Science Workflow
Apply Data Science Workflow techniques in practical, real-world scenarios
Analyze the relationship between Data Science Workflow and other topics in Introduction to Data Science
Evaluate the effectiveness of different approaches to Data Science Workflow
Create solutions using Data Science Workflow methodologies and best practices
